name: Fluffy, Prey of Dead Souls
description:
This is a game made for the Mix And Game Jam within the 49 hour timeframe, but we were unable to submit it on time. The only thing I have changed since then is I have fixed an issue where the player was able to move after they died.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to switch between weapons
  • Left click to attack
  • Right click to use dash or shoot an extra-large bullet depending on your weapon (These right-click abilities work only if you time your click with the music. There is also delay between each attack.)
  • 'R' to return to the menu if you die

Enjoy!

Programming and map art by myself.

Sprite art by https://avocadoz.itch.io/

Music by the both of us.

Made with Unity.
